question: In which country "Ruins of Loropeni" is located?
explanation: Ruins of Loropeni is located in Burkina Faso. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. These ruins are Burkina Faso's first World Heritage Site. The site was once prospered through trans-Saharan Gold Trade. This site contains the remains of once-powerful thousand years old fortresses. It was the settlement of Lohron or Kulango people.
